name: SteaMine
description:
In SteaMine, you’ll have to go down the cave to Mine, Smelt, and sell your Ores/Ingots to make enough money to build your Robot-Girlfriend a magnificent love statue.

But! You don’t have infinite time in the cave, each time you go down you’ll have a time limit until the cave collapse on your platform. And be careful the game saves when you go up.

 

SO DON’T GET CRUSHED!!

 

And give the newly random generated cave a walk you’ll not expect what you might find down there.

 

The Controls are pretty simple:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD to move
  • Space to Interact with everything (Mine,Smelt,Sell,Talk to NPCs and more…)

 

DevLogs PlayList: here

Game Main Theme Music: Mr Gear
